divs: sighting detailsschmidt reports that he was sitting on a stump at the edge of the woods, near to his home. it was twilight. he heard (apparently telepathically) a buzzing in his head, as he had heard during his previous encounter with the same (or similar) craft. he saw a glowing, disk-shaped craft shoot across the sky, followed by four glowing orbs (glowing green, red\orange, yellow and purple). the green orb stopped and hovered, then the red one came back, bumped into the green one, then both followed the disk out of sight.
Summary: Disk-shaped object followed by four orbs. All glowing.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Granite Falls
There were no other sightings in Granite Falls on or around May 2nd 2006
